title: Deep Nourishment: Ayurvedic Body Butters for Dry Skin
author: Harish
excerpt: Dry Vata skin craves nourishment. Learn how shea, coconut oil, and amla create deep hydration the Ayurvedic way.
content:
Why Body Butters Work So Well

Dry, rough skin is a sign of aggravated Vata. Thick, unctuous body butters soothe dryness, restore softness, and support healthy skin texture.

Ayurvedic Ingredients for Deep Hydration

  • Shea Butter: Intensely moisturizing and protective.
  • Coconut Oil: Cooling, soothing, and nourishing.
  • Amla: Rich in vitamin C and antioxidants.

How to Apply for Best Results

Use after a warm shower while skin is still damp. Massage slowly in long strokes to enhance absorption and calm Vata.

Extra Tips for Dry Skin

  • Drink warm water throughout the day.
  • Include ghee in diet for internal lubrication.
  • Use gentle cleansers, avoid hot showers.

Shop Herbal Body Butter and nourish your skin naturally.
